tool_description: Creates and configures dynamic pricing rules with conditions, triggers, and automated pricing actions.

rule_name.description: Unique name for the pricing rule

rule_description.description: Description of what the rule does

price_action.description: Pricing action: increase, decrease, match_competitor, optimize

max_price.description: Maximum allowed price for this rule

min_price.description: Minimum allowed price for this rule

apply_to_products.description: Product IDs this rule applies to

rule_duration_days.description: Days rule remains active, None for permanent

notification_enabled.description: Whether to send notifications when rule triggers

error_messages: Invalid rule name: rule_name must be unique and non-empty string
Invalid price action: use increase, decrease, match_competitor, or optimize
Invalid priority level: priority_level must be integer between 1 and 10
Invalid active hours: active_hours must contain integers between 0 and 23
Price constraint conflict: max_price must be greater than min_price
Invalid cooldown: cooldown_minutes must be positive integer
Empty product list: apply_to_products must contain at least one product ID
Invalid adjustment percentage: price_adjustment_percent must be positive number for increase/decrease actions
usage: Create pricing rules by specifying rule_name, description, trigger_conditions, price_action, and apply_to_products. Configure additional parameters like priority, time constraints, and price limits as needed.

rule_id.description: Unique identifier for the created rule

rule_status.description: Status of rule creation: active, inactive, error

validation_status.description: Rule validation result: valid, warning, invalid

estimated_impact.description: Expected impact assessment: high, medium, low
